==Lore==
Blackcliff Forge was constructed by excavating the mountains and connecting workshops and furnaces with tunnels. According to the Stone Tablet Compilations, the founder of the [[Yun Family|Yun family]] was the first to tunnel through the mountains. It is said that mountain tribes sought shelter here during times of war, and that there are long-forgotten passages leading to an ancient underground realm.<ref>{{Ref/Weapon|Cloudforged}}</ref>
